item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, October 10, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Trump pledges to end double taxation for expat Americans
2. HSBC targets senior bankers in cost-cutting plan
3. Ocasio-Cortez warns of ‘brawl’ if Kamala Harris removes Lina Khan
4. Hurricane Milton leaves millions without power after lashing Florida
5. The ‘80-hour circuit breaker’: Wall Street banks tackle workloads of junior staff
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, October 10, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
